snippet.title: MindsEye - Official Cinematic Trailer | 2025
snippet.description:
All footage captured in-game.
Fight your fate. MindsEye. From Game Director, Leslie Benzies. Coming Summer 2025.  

MindsEye is a narrative-driven, single-player action-adventure thriller set in the near-future fictional desert city of Redrock, where artificial intelligence and human greed collide to bring Earth to the precipice of collapse. It’s a compelling story, with strategic combat, high-octane driving, and endless entertainment.

This trailer is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (LATAM), Chinese (Traditional), Chinese (Simplified), Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil) and Arabic.

Dropped during PlayStation State of Play, MindsEye premiered a cinematic story trailer and a gameplay showcase, giving players a first look at its near-future setting, explosive combat, and adrenaline-fueled driving sequences.

Wishlist now: https://www.mindseye.game

Music Credit:
https://idol-io.ffm.to/rivalconsoles-looming 
Looming (Heavy Duty Remix)
Written and performed by Rival Consoles 
Published by Erased Tapes Music 
Courtesy of Erased Tapes Records
